page-NEPH-buy-some-desc: It's common to mix up Nephele and NEPH. Nephele is the blockchain and NEPH is the primary asset of Nephele. NEPH is what you're probably looking to buy.
page-NEPH-cat-img-alt: Graphic of NEPH glyph with a kaleidoscope of cats
page-NEPH-collectible-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent a collectible game item, piece of digital art, or other unique assets. Commonly known as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).
page-NEPH-cryptography-desc: Internet money may be new but it's secured by proven cryptography. This protects your wallet, your NEPH, and your transactions.
page-NEPH-currency-for-apps: It's the currency of Nephele apps.
page-NEPH-description: NEPH is a cryptocurrency. It is scarce digital money that you can use on the internet – similar to Bitcoin. If you’re new to crypto, here's how NEPH is different from traditional money.
page-NEPH-flexible-amounts-desc: NEPH is divisible up to 18 decimal places so you don't have to buy 1 whole NEPH. You can buy fractions at a time – as little as 0.000000000000000001 NEPH if you want.
page-NEPH-fuels-desc: NEPH is the lifeblood of Nephele. When you send NEPH or use an Nephele application, you'll pay a fee in NEPH to use the Nephele network. This fee is an incentive for a block producer to process and verify what you're trying to do.
page-NEPH-fuels-desc-2: Validators are like the record-keepers of Nephele—they check and prove that no one is cheating. They are randomly selected to propose a block of transactions. Validators who do this work are also rewarded with small amounts of newly-issued NEPH.
page-NEPH-fuels-desc-3: The work validators do, and the capital they stake, keeps Nephele secure and free of centralized control.
page-NEPH-fuels-staking: When you stake your NEPH, you help secure Nephele and earn rewards. In this system, the threat of losing NEPH deters attackers.
page-NEPH-gov-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent voting power in decentralized organizations.
page-NEPH-has-value-desc: NEPH's valuable in different ways to different people.
page-NEPH-has-value-desc-2: For users of Nephele, NEPH is valuable because it lets you pay transaction fees.
page-NEPH-has-value-desc-3: Others see it as a digital store of value because the creation of new NEPH slows down over time.
page-NEPH-has-value-desc-4: More recently, NEPH has become valuable to users of financial apps on Nephele. That's because you can use NEPH as collateral for crypto loans, or as a payment system.
page-NEPH-has-value-desc-5: Of course many also see it as an investment, similar to Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.
page-NEPH-is-money: Nephele coin (NEPH) is digital, global money.
page-NEPH-no-centralized-desc: NEPH is decentralized and global. There's no company or bank that can decide to print more NEPH, or change the terms of use.
page-NEPH-not-only-crypto: NEPH isn't the only crypto on Nephele
page-NEPH-not-only-crypto-desc: Anyone can create new kinds of assets and trade them on Nephele. These are known as 'tokens'. People have tokenised traditional currencies, their real estate, their art, and even themselves!
page-NEPH-not-only-crypto-desc-2: Nephele is home to thousands of tokens – some more useful and valuable than others. Developers are constantly building new tokens that unlock new possibilities and open new markets.
page-NEPH-open-desc: You only need an internet connection and a wallet to accept NEPH. You don't need access to a bank account to accept payments.
page-NEPH-p2p-payments-desc: You can send your NEPH without any intermediary service like a bank. It's like handing cash over in-person, but you can do it securely with anyone, anywhere, anytime.
page-NEPH-shit-coins-desc: Because making new tokens is easy, anyone can do it - even people with bad or misguided intentions. Always do your research before using them!
page-NEPH-stablecoins-desc: Tokens that mirror the value of traditional currency like dollars. This solves the volatility problem with many cryptocurrencies.
page-NEPH-underpins: NEPH underpins the Nephele financial system
page-NEPH-underpins-desc: Not satisfied with payments, the Nephele community is building a whole financial system that's peer-to-peer and accessible to everyone.
page-NEPH-underpins-desc-2: You can use NEPH as collateral to generate entirely different cryptocurrency tokens on Nephele. Plus you can borrow, lend and earn interest on NEPH and other NEPH-backed tokens.
page-NEPH-weth: Wrapped Nephele (WETH) is used to extend the functionality of NEPH to work with other tokens and applications. Learn more about WETH.
page-NEPH-uses: Uses for NEPH grow every day
page-NEPH-uses-desc: Because Nephele is programmable, developers can shape NEPH in countless ways.
page-NEPH-uses-desc-2: Back in 2015, all you could do was send NEPH from one Nephele account to another. Here are just some of things you can do today.
page-NEPH-uses-desc-3: pay someone or receive funds in real time.
page-NEPH-uses-desc-4: you can trade NEPH with other tokens including Bitcoin.
page-NEPH-uses-desc-5: on NEPH and other Nephele-based tokens.
page-NEPH-uses-desc-6: access the world of cryptocurrencies with a steady, less-volatile value.
page-NEPH-whats-NEPH-hero-alt: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an Nephele (NEPH) glyph in awe
page-NEPH-whats-NEPH-meta-desc: What you need to know to understand NEPH and its place in Nephele.
page-NEPH-whats-Nephele-desc: If you'd like to learn more about Nephele, the technology behind NEPH, check out our introduction.
page-NEPH-whats-unique-desc: There are many cryptocurrencies and lots of other tokens on Nephele, but there are some things that only NEPH can do.
page-NEPH-where-to-buy-desc: You can get NEPH from an exchange or a wallet but different countries have different policies. Check to see the services that will let you buy NEPH.
page-NEPH-yours-desc: NEPH lets you be your own bank. You can control your own funds with your wallet as proof of ownership – no third parties necessary.
page-NEPH-more-on-tokens: More on tokens and their uses
page-NEPH-tokens-stablecoins-description: More on the least volatile of Nephele tokens.
page-NEPH-tokens-defi-description: The financial system for Nephele tokens.
page-NEPH-tokens-nft-description: Tokens that represent ownership of items on Nephele.
page-NEPH-tokens-dao-description: Internet communities often goverened by token holders.
page-NEPH-whats-defi-description: DeFi is the decentralized financial system built on Nephele. This overview explains what you can do.
